CustomField.description: For master records (Type = MASTER_*), it is the time taken in seconds for database operations in server, with the value calculated using this formula: Server Processing Time - Code Execution Time. For logs pushed by client app, it is the the level (1/2/3) of log message. Messages with level 3 are logged when the client app log level is Verbose. Level 2 messages are logged for the log level Warning. Level 1 messages are logged for the log level Error.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For master records (Type = MASTER_*), it is the time taken in seconds for DB operations in server: Server Processing Time - Code Execution Time. For logs pushed by client app, it is the the level (1/2/3) of log message (3 logged when level is verbose).
CustomField.label: Log level
